description:
Raymond is a 21-year-old college student who lives in a big, wild, noisy frat house.
"I love it," he told us. "There's never a dull moment."
He said in his interview that he went on a bender for his 21st birthday, but I'm guessing he's been tossing them back since high school!
The best part of living in a frat house:
"We're always naked," he said. "Nobody wears any clothes."
He said it was weird for him at first, but after the novelty wore off it didn't really matter any more.
"I love being naked," he said.
Another great thing about the frat house: The girls who visit.
"They love it there," he said. "They never want to leave!"
title: Raymond
